title: Modern Web Development
description: Comprehensive overview of modern web development including frontend frameworks, backend technologies, databases, and deployment strategies.

children.title: Frontend Development
children.description: Frontend development focuses on creating user interfaces and experiences using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript frameworks.

children.title: React
children.description: React is a JavaScript library for building user interfaces with a virtual DOM and declarative approach.

children.title: Vue.js
children.description: Vue.js is an approachable framework for building web interfaces with excellent documentation.

children.title: Backend Development
children.description: Backend development handles server-side operations, APIs, and business logic implementation.

children.title: Node.js
children.description: Node.js enables JavaScript execution on servers using V8 engine.

children.title: Python
children.description: Python offers frameworks like Django and Flask for web development.

children.title: DevOps
children.description: DevOps practices streamline development and operations through automation.

children.title: Docker
children.description: Docker packages applications into portable containers.
